trans-unit.source: Represents the Evidence element specified in [Saml2Core, 2.7.4.3].
Contains one or more assertions or assertion references that the SAML authority relied on in issuing the authorization decision.
[Saml2Core, 2.7.4.3]
For more information about the element that this class represents, see the SAML V2.0 Core specification.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Evidence"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Evidence"></xref> class with the specified assertion.
The specified assertion is added to the collection accessed through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Evidence.Assertions%2A> property.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Assertion"></xref> that contains the evidence.
assertion is `null`.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Evidence"></xref> class with an ID that references an assertion.
The specified ID is added to the collection accessed through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Evidence.AssertionIdReferences%2A> property.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Id"></xref> that references the assertion.
idReference is `null`.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Evidence"></xref> class with a URI that references an assertion.
The specified URI is added to the collection accessed through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Evidence.AssertionUriReferences%2A> property.
A <xref href="System.Uri"></xref> that references an assertion.
uriReference is `null`.
Gets the collection of assertions referenced by ID.
A collection of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Id"></xref> that contains IDs that reference the assertions.
Gets the collection of assertions specified by value.
A collection of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Assertion"></xref> that contains the assertions.
Gets the collection of assertions referenced by URI.
A collection of type <xref href="System.Uri"></xref> that contains URIs that reference the assertions.
